name: Marshall Smith
description: My desire is to meet a woman with inner beauty,because that makes that woman very beautiful, kind heart and with good heart, and that woman need to be very sensitive, serious, warm and assertive woman, I’m looking for a special,loving relationship with a unique woman who is affectionate, beautiful,with a shapely figure, sincere, easygoing,with interests and characteristics similar to mine, someone who wants a meaningful,serious,long-term relationship… Not just a few dates, because I am tired of being lonely without a life partner !
